generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Entity Dig Behavior
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Allows this entity to dig into the ground before despawning.

fields.title: Allow Dig When Named
fields.description: If true, this behavior can run when this entity is named. Otherwise not.

fields.title: Digs In Daylight
fields.description: Indicates that the actor should start digging when it sees daylight

fields.title: Idle Time
fields.description: The minimum idle time in seconds between the last detected disturbance to the start of digging.

fields.title: Start
fields.description: Event(s) to run when the goal starts.

fields.title: Suspicion Is Disturbance
fields.description: If true, finding new suspicious locations count as disturbances that may delay the start of this goal.

fields.title: Vibration Is Disturbance
fields.description: If true, vibrations count as disturbances that may delay the start of this goal.
